job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongThe Audience Development and Analytics department drives strategic and operational decisions for The Washington Post  This highly visible team applies analytics and research to support strategic initiatives and daytoday operational support companywide and is currently seeking a Data Scientistbrbr brbrAs our Data Scientist youll report to the Director of Analytics and work in close collaboration with the newsroom marketing product engineering advertising and finance departments on a diverse range of advanced analytics projects that have a critical and strategic impact on all aspects of the company  You will regularly interact with various stakeholders in these departments understand needs conduct data analysis and make actionable recommendations You will love solving openended problems by taking mountains of data transforming it into meaningful analysis aimed towards identifying solutions and opportunities You are happiest in a role where you can solve problems where business math technology and practical intuition convergebrbr brbrstrongResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliCollaborate with stakeholders across departments to understand analytic needs and deliver impactful findingsliliUtilize information retrieval data analytics and statistical modeling techniques to build new machine learning models like propensity to subscribe propensity to churn customer lookalike models etc This will include the entire lifecycle including data acquisition feature engineering model development training testing deployment operationalization and tuningliliSupport and optimize existing analytical modelsproductsliliPerform and present analyses on large sets of data to extract important insights that will help drive product and business decisionsliliRecommend and test new analytics algorithms and models in marketing and subscription analytics contextliliPrepare and present reports analysis and presentations to various stakeholders including executives Educate the organization on new analytical approaches to drive business decisionsbrbrliulstrongRequirementsbrbrstrongMinimum QualificationsbrulliDegree in computer science engineering mathematics or a related technical quantitative disciplinelili3 years of data analytics experience with a strong preference for experience in web analyticsliliDeep understanding of statistics and experience working with realworld data as well as a strong business senseliliAbility to apply business logic to design and implement data mining techniques on large data setsliliComfortable navigating large complex datasets and using programming languages for analytics PythonRliliStrong analytical and communication skills Experience visualizing data andor building dashboards TableauliliAbility to multitask prioritize projects and meet deadlinesbrbrliulstrongPreferred QualificationsbrstrongulliExpertise in SQL R Python ML ecosystem data analysis and statistical analysis packagesliliExpertise in predictive and prescriptive analytics machine learning techniques time series models and one or more deep learning librariesliliExpertise in Big Data tools and distributed datacomputing tools like Hadoop or other bigdata solutions MapReduce S3 Hive Spark etcliliKnowledge and experience with AB testing is a plusliliKnowledge and experience with Deep learning with TensorFlow is a plusliliKnowledge and experience with Natural Language Processing is a plusliliKnowledge of enterprise Web Analytics systems and media publishing industry experience is preferredliliKnowledge of Tableau R Shiny D3 or other visualization reporting toolsbrbrliulstrong The Post strives to provide its readers with highquality trustworthy news and information while constantly innovating That mission is best served by a diverse multigenerational workforce with varied life experiences and perspectives All cultures and backgrounds are welcomed brbrstrongThe innovation doesnt end in the Newsroom  dozens of teams power strongThe Washington Poststrong We are now hiring the next innovator  how will youstrong Impact Tomorrowstrongbrbremwashpostlifeem
